title: [Valley of Gold, Bazaar]
description: Thick branches fan out from the various trees scattered about, shading the clearing from the hot sun above.  Bright sapphire blue banners embroidered with an alabaster peacock fly high above.  Twined ribbons in matching colors wrap about each varnished pole ending in a bouquet of pure white roses.

Thick branches fan out from the various trees scattered about, allowing motes of pale moonlight to filter through.  Bright sapphire blue banners embroidered with an alabaster peacock fly high above.  Twined ribbons in matching colors wrap about each varnished pole ending in a bouquet of pure white roses.
location: between Wehnimer's Landing and Zul Logoth
